level_1.skillDescription:
A forward-leap attack imbued with fire
Causes the ground around the impact to catch on fire, dealing continuous damage

level_2.skillDescription:
Leap up to 2 times
After both attacks, the ground will catch fire

level_3.skillDescription:
Leap up to 3 times
After all 3 attacks, the ground will catch fire

abilities.skillDescription: Decreases the ground fire's size but increases its damage
Increases the duration of the ground fire
